participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic, enjoys building and sharing interests.
participant_1.background: Has a background in construction and loves animals, especially cats.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Curious and open-minded, enjoys discussing hobbies and pets.
participant_2.background: Works in graphic design and has a passion for creativity and design.

content.text: I am going to build a new house. Do you need it?
I could do it for you for free! I enjoy buildong.
I`d like to show you my cat. Do you have one?
